channel.title: Patch Notes in game
channel.description:
Is there a way we can get patch notes into the game itself . Like when you first log onto the game after a patch the latest Patch Notes opens up on the screen and after like a minute you can click off them .
The amount of times post patch I come up against someone who has no clue what's changed etc. is astonishing . Some people I guess wont read anyway , but it would help with those whoa re not necessarily knowing where to get the patch notes

item.title: Patch Notes in game
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Yeah, this is a necessary feature. Jusr keep a running patch notes file where you can see what each update did. Have a small box on the login screen that shows the most recent patch, and for anything with more than bug fixes open a popup upon login. In game (once logged in), alongside the rules, allow the player to read through the patch notes.
